description: Fols. 171; 19 x 13.5 cm.; written surface 15 x 11 cm.; 15 lines to page; on glazed Arabic paper; in naskhi; with vowel signs; entries and headings in red; green asterisks. MS in very poor condition; badly worm-eaten. Arabic leather binding with flap. Probably from XVIIth century. Acquired from Bārūdī, Beirūt, A.D. 1925.
title: [Collection of Druze texts].
subject: Druzes—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
